abstract: Weekly yoga classes relieve symptoms of low back pain about as well as intense, regular stretching sessions, a new study shows.
snippet: Weekly yoga classes relieve symptoms of low back pain about as well as intense, regular stretching sessions, a new study shows.
lead_paragraph: Weekly yoga classes relieve symptoms of low back pain about as well as intense, regular stretching sessions, a new study shows.

headline.main: Yoga and Stretching Equally Effective for Back Pain
